page.title: 15CHURCHES IN SEAHAM
page.content: SEAHAM HAS CHURCHES AND LEADERS WHICH CATER FOR THE SPIRITUAL NEEDS OF BOTH MAJOR RELIGIONS,PROTESTANT AND CATHOLIC.THERE ARE ALSO TWO CHURCHES FOR THE SMALLER SECTS,AN EBENEZER HALL AND A KINGDOM HALL OF JEHOVAH'S WITNESSES.THERE ARE SIX CHURCH OF ENGLAND CHURCHES,TWO OF WHICH DATE BACK TO SAXON AND NORMAN TIMES AND ARE NOT USED AS MUCH AS THE OTHERS.THE CATHOLICS HAVE TWO CHURCHES IN SEAHAM, NAMELY ST.MARY MAGDALENES AND ST.CUTHBERTS.THE METHODIST COMMUNITY OF SEAHAM HAS FOUR CHAPELS.THROUGHOUT THE YEAR THE CHURCH PROVIDES MUCH ENTERTAINMENT AND FUND RAISING ACTIVITIES FOR THE PEOPLE OF SEAHAM.IN 1985 IT HAS CONCERNED ITSELF MUCH WITH RAISING HELP FOR THE FAMINE VICTIMS OF ETHIOPIA.FETES,FAYRES AND CONCERTS ARE A COMMON PART OF THE LIFE OF ALL OF SEAHAM'S CHURCHES.
